sqlMap.select: SELECT id, balans_id as balanceType, boekjaar as jaar, saldo FROM boekwaarde
sqlMap.update: update restwaarde set restwaarde = #restwaarde# where id = #id# and user_id = #userId#
update restwaarde set restwaarde = #restwaarde# where activa_id = #activaId# and user_id = #userId#
sqlMap.select: select bw.id, bs.id as balanceType, boekjaar as jaar, saldo from boekwaarde as bw, balanssoort as bs, balans as b where user_id=#userId# and b.balanssoort_id = bs.id and bw.balans_id = b.id and bw.id = #id#

select bw.id, boekjaar as jaar, saldo from boekwaarde as bw, balanssoort as bs, balans as b where user_id=#userId# and b.balanssoort_id = bs.id and bw.balans_id = b.id order by balans_id asc, boekjaar asc;

select restwaarde.id, activa.id as activaId, restwaarde.restwaarde from activa, restwaarde , kosten, balans where kosten.id = activa.kost_id and restwaarde.activa_id = activa.id and balans.id = activa.balans_id and balans.balanssoort_id = 1 and activa.einddatum is null and activa.user_id = #userId# and restwaarde.user_id = #userId#

select bw.id, balans_id as balanceType, boekjaar as jaar, saldo from boekwaarde as bw, balanssoort as bs, balans as b where user_id=#userId# and b.balanssoort_id = bs.id and bw.balans_id = b.id order by balans_id asc, boekjaar desc;
